component.name: LibItem
component.script:
sub Init() m.itemText = m.top.findNode("itemText") m.itemText.text = "Loading..."
maxSize = m.top.getParent().itemSize m.itemText.width = maxSize[0]
m.itemText.translation = [0, (maxSize[1] / 2) - 15]
end sub
function itemContentChanged() as void m.itemText = m.top.findNode("itemText") itemData = m.top.itemContent m.itemText.text = itemData.labelText end function
